data.rationale:
Namespace choice: This module encode / decode strings of complex
    data structure with HTML entities recursively. I think this
    namespace is suitable.

    Uniqueness: To proxy content provider's API, we sometimes want to
    bulk decode and encode complex data structure that contains escaped
    strings with untrustworthy way. HTML::Entities::Recursive helps you
    to make output safe with ease.
